name: Nick fritzie
coverLetter: Iv been a medical grower for the past 6 years. I currently crop once a month. I have plenty of trim/garden experience on a large scale. I can name almost every nutrient line organic spray exc. I can build closed loops trim you name it I can do it. I am an above average trimmer. I also have a trimming machine. I can chop wet dry de leaf work on plants steak clone exc. I've downsized lately. Pretty flexible on hours Nightshifts to.
